data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Leon throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 3, Pumas UNAM's Juan Iturbe gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 12, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 13, Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 16, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Leon's Joel Campbell attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Leon's half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Leon.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Juan Iturbe for Pumas UNAM drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 24, Pumas UNAM's Andres Iniestra misses with an attempt on goal.
Leon have a goal kick.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leon drives forward and Luis Montes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 28, Leon have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 29, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Leon throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Leon to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 32, Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pumas UNAM's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 36, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 40, Pumas UNAM are pushing forward but Juan Iturbe's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Juan Iturbe gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pumas UNAM.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Leon are coming forward and Jose Rodriguez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Emanuel Gigliotti is replacing Joel Campbell for the away team.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a throw-in for Pumas UNAM, close to Leon's area.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Leon a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Leon's Angel Mena gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Pumas UNAM defender.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Mexico City to check on Juan Iturbe, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 53, Carlos Gutierrez (Pumas UNAM) has replaced the possibly injured Juan Iturbe at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Throw-in high up the field for Leon in Mexico City.
In the minute 57, Leon needs to be cautious. Pumas UNAM have an attacking throw-in.
Pumas UNAM are in shooting range from this free kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 62, Juan Vigon for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 65, Stiven Barreiro for Leon has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
Carlos Gonzalez (Pumas UNAM) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Leon have a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 68, Leon make their second substitution with David Ramirez replacing Jose Rodriguez.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Carlos Gonzalez heads in to make it 1-0 at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Leon are whistled for offside.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Leonel Lopez with Erik Lira. This is the second substitution made today by Andres Lillini.
Pumas UNAM's Andres Iniestra gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
He's off! Stiven Barreiro is shown a second yellow card.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 84, Juan Ignacio Gonzalez is on a sub for Jean Meneses for Leon.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Leon.
In the minute 86, Throw-in Leon.
Andres Lillini (Pumas UNAM) is making a third substitution, with Jero Rodriguez replacing Carlos Gonzalez.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Leon go level at 1-1 through Emanuel Gigliotti in Mexico City.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Leon's half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
The away team replace Fernando Navarro with Jose Godinez.
Andres Iniestra (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
